title: BRIEF-Akorn Says Does Not Believe Investigation Should Affect Closing Of Transaction With Fresenius​
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Akorn Inc:
* AKORN ISSUES STATEMENT ON INVESTIGATION * AKORN - CO, ‍FRESENIUS, WITH ASSISTANCE OF CONSULTANTS, INVESTIGATING ALLEGED BREACHES OF FDA DATA INTEGRITY REQUIREMENTS RELATING TO PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT AT CO
* SAYS, ‍TO DATE, COMPANY‘S INVESTIGATION HAS NOT FOUND ANY FACTS THAT WOULD RESULT IN A MATERIAL IMPACT ON AKORN‘S OPERATIONS​
* ‍COMPANY DOES NOT BELIEVE THIS INVESTIGATION SHOULD AFFECT CLOSING OF TRANSACTION WITH FRESENIUS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
